Body:
@asynccontextmanager
async def start_server(endpoint: str='inproc://controller', *, handler_dict:
    handlers.HandlerCallbackDict=handler_dict):
    async with trio_aio_loop(), zmq_trio_ctx(
        ) as ctx, hardware_handler, trio.open_nursery() as nursery:
        server = HedgehogServer(ctx, endpoint, handler_dict)
        await nursery.start(server.run)
        yield server
        server.stop()
return start_server
pytest.fixture
